name: Color Mumble
summary:
Color Mumble is an Puzzle word game that keeps your brain sizzling.
Your objective:
unscramble as many five-letter words as you can with out running out of time. With two game modality, you will be entertained for hours. In Endless mode, you get 20 seconds to unscramble each word. In Time mode, solve as many words as you can in 3 minutes.
